00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_TRAITS_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_TRAITS_H_
00029 
00030 #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DISABLE_CPP0X
00031 #include <tr1/type_traits>
00032 #else
00033 #include <type_traits>
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #include "compile_assert.h"
00037 
00038 namespace kche_tree {
00039 
00053 template <typename T>
00054 struct has_trivial_equal :
00055 #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DISABLE_CPP0X
00056     std::tr1::integral_constant<bool, std::tr1::is_fundamental<T>::value>
00057 #else
00058     std::integral_constant<bool, std::is_fundamental<T>::value>
00059 #endif
00060     {};
00061 
00062 // Forward-declare the templates provided here.
00063 template <typename T> struct Traits;
00064 template <typename T> struct AccumulationTraits;
00065 template <typename T, bool hasTrivialEqual> struct EqualTraits;
00066 template <typename T, bool hasTrivialCopy> struct CopyTraits;
00067 
00073 template <typename T>
00074 struct TraitsBase {
00075   typedef T Type; 
00076   static T zero() { return T(); } 
00077 };
00078 
00088 template <typename T>
00089 struct AccumulationTraits {
00090   // In case we need more precision, this should be specialized with a promotion of the T type.
00091   typedef T AccumulatorType; 
00092 };
00093 
00097 template <typename T>
00098 struct EqualTraits<T, true> {
00107   static bool equal_arrays(const T *p1, const T *p2, unsigned int size) {
00108     return memcmp(p1, p2, size * sizeof(T)) == 0;
00109   }
00110 };
00111 
00115 template <typename T>
00116 struct EqualTraits<T, false> {
00125   static bool equal_arrays(const T *p1, const T *p2, unsigned int size) {
00126     return std::equal(p1, p1 + size, p2);
00127   }
00128 };
00129 
00133 template <typename T>
00134 struct CopyTraits<T, true> {
00143   static void copy_array(T *dest, const T *source, unsigned int size) {
00144     memcpy(dest, source, size * sizeof(T));
00145   }
00146 };
00147 
00151 template <typename T>
00152 struct CopyTraits<T, false> {
00161   static void copy_array(T *dest, const T *source, unsigned int size) {
00162     std::copy(source, source + size, dest);
00163   }
00164 };
00165 
00171 template <typename T>
00172 struct Traits : TraitsBase<T>,
00173                 AccumulationTraits<T>,
00174                 #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DISABLE_CPP0X
00175                 CopyTraits<T, std::tr1::has_trivial_copy<T>::value>,
00176                 #else
00177                 CopyTraits<T, std::has_trivial_copy_constructor<T>::value>,
00178                 #endif
00179                 EqualTraits<T, has_trivial_equal<T>::value> {};
00180 
00181 } // namespace kche_tree
00182 
00183 #endif
